title: Active Minds
description: Active Minds is a nonprofit organization dedicated to raising mental health awareness among college students. They provide resources, education, and support to promote mental wellness on campuses.

title: The Jed Foundation (JED)
description: The Jed Foundation is a nonprofit organization that protects emotional health and prevents suicide among college and university students. They offer programs and resources to equip campuses with mental health support systems.

title: National Alliance on Mental Illness (NAMI) on Campus
description: NAMI on Campus is an extension of the National Alliance on Mental Illness focused on supporting college students with mental health conditions. They provide advocacy, education, and support groups to create mentally healthy college communities.

title: Active Minds at Colleges
description: Active Minds at Colleges are campus chapters affiliated with the larger Active Minds organization. These chapters work to reduce the stigma surrounding mental health issues and provide peer support and education on campuses.

title: Counseling and Psychological Services (CAPS)
description: CAPS is a university-based counseling center that offers mental health services to students. They provide individual counseling, group therapy, workshops, and crisis intervention to support students' emotional well-being.

title: Therapy Assistance Online (TAO)
description: TAO is an online platform that offers self-help resources, interactive therapy modules, and mindfulness exercises for students struggling with mental health issues. It provides accessible mental health support anytime, anywhere.

title: Project LETS (Let's Erase the Stigma)
description: Project LETS is a grassroots organization focused on peer support and advocacy for mental health issues on college campuses. They offer peer-led support groups, workshops, and campaigns to promote mental wellness and fight stigma.

title: American Foundation for Suicide Prevention (AFSP) Campus Walk
description: AFSP Campus Walks are events organized by the American Foundation for Suicide Prevention to raise awareness and funds for suicide prevention efforts on college campuses. These walks bring together students, faculty, and community members to support mental health initiatives.
